explanation: [0-0] The video is divided into four parts. In the upper left part, a woman with long pink hair and a man in a red and black striped sweater stand on grass with mountains in the background. In the lower left part, two women with long hair stand in front of the camera, one in black outerwear wearing a black mask and the other in white clothes wearing a white mask. In the upper right part, a woman in white clothes stands in a room with a bed and a lamp on the bedside table. In the lower right part, a smiling man in a black T-shirt stands in a room with many pictures on the wall.

[0-10] The woman in the upper left corner moves away from the camera and then dances with the man to her left. The woman extends her left hand, the man extends his right hand, and they make a heart shape with their hands above their heads. They then hold hands and turn to face the camera. The man extends his right hand, the woman extends her left hand, and they make a heart shape again. In the lower left corner, the woman in black dances with the woman in white towards the camera, making the same hand gestures as the man and woman in the upper left corner. They also switch positions and make a heart shape with their hands. The woman in the upper right corner also does the same dance, smiling and raising her right hand to her head with the music to make half of a heart shape, but then she looks to the right, her smile disappears, and a person walks out of the shot to the left. In the lower right corner, a woman in white clothes walks into the shot. She takes a pen and draws half a white heart on her right cheek. Then she draws the other half of the heart on the man's left cheek. They then smile and put their faces together, the white patterns on their faces forming a complete heart.
